All Classes

Class
Description
AbstractBaseHandler
This class represents a general handler involving file selection.
AbstractGroupCluesView
Represents a grouping of clues.
AbstractOrientedClueView
This class provides a basic implementation of an AbstractOrientedClueView.
CellGridView
This class is a GridPane that displays the cell states
CellState
This enum is used to represent the state of the NonogramModel grid.
CellView
This represents a single nonogram cell that can be shown as empty, filled, or marked.
ClueItemView
Represents an individual clue cell.
HorizontalClueView
Represents a horizontal row of clues.
LeftCluesView
Represents a view containing all row clues displayed to the left of the grid.
Main
The Main class has one instance method that sets the content of the Application window.
NonogramModel
This class encapsulates the state and rules of the game.
NonogramPresenter
As in project 4, the NonogramPresenter class represents the brain of our program.
NonogramView
This class is a BorderPane that displays the row clues in the left position, the column clues in the top position, and the cells in the middle position.
Openable
A simple interface used to specify that a class has a special method to handle opening a file.
OpenHandler
This class extends the AbstractBaseHandler class, and implements the EventHandler interface and the handle method.
TopCluesView
Represents a view containing all column clues displayed above the grid.
VerticalClueView
This class represents the numbered clues for a single column.
